name: Racing in Formula Car
description:
Racing in Formula Car with turbo fast cars against opponents on 3D tracks. Overtake, dodge and crash them to finish the last check point. Avoid accidents and crashes. Become amazing formula car driver. Amazingly extreme challenging missions.

Features:
- 3D NEW-GEN Graphics
- Super-charged action packed motor racing simulator
- Smooth and intuitive motor handling controls
- High speed car racing with tilt controls
- Various tracks and scenario to choose from
- Rich selection of game props
- Do more stunts to get higher scores and bonus
